panels.description: Aggregate sum of average commits per second for each TE in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT SUM(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Commits" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time > ${__to}ms - 1m AND time <= ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid" )

panels.title: Commits/sec

panels.description: Aggregate sum of average rollbacks per second for each TE in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Rollbacks" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time > ${__to}ms - 1m AND time <= ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid")

panels.title: Rollbacks/sec

panels.description: Aggregate sum of the average number of client connections in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("raw") as a FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ( "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ ) AND time >= ${__to}ms - 1m and time < ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid")

panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Aggregate sum of average number of rows updated per second for each TE in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Updates" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= ${__to}ms - 1m AND time < ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid")

panels.title: Row Updates/sec

panels.description: Aggregate sum of average number of rows deleted per second for each TE in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Deletes" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= ${__to}ms - 1m AND time < ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid")

panels.title: Deletes/sec

panels.description: Aggregate sum of average number of rows inserted per second for each TE in the most recent one minute interval of the current displayed time window.

targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Inserts" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND time >= ${__to}ms - 1m AND time < ${__to}ms GROUP BY "host","pid")

panels.title: Insert/sec

panels.description: the number of SQL connections established with each selected TE at the time the metric is collected.  The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT mean("raw") AS raw FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)

panels.title: Connections

panels.description: This graph shows the average number of SQL connections executing within the database for the collection interval.   This is displayed per TE.   The value is calculated as SqlListenerSqlProcTime/Milliseconds  * 1000.  Since the value SqlListenerSqlProcTime is only incremented after a thread completes the transaction,  a long running sql statement will skew these numbers and large spikes will be noticed in the graph. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Average number of commits per seconds within each selected TE. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Commits" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)

panels.title: Commits

panels.description: Average number of rollbacks per second within each selected TE. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") FROM "Rollbacks" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Rollbacks

panels.description: Average number of rows inserted  per second for each selected TE. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Inserts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Rows Inserted

panels.description: Average number of rows updated  per second for each selected TE. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.
panels.title: Rows Updates

panels.description: Average number of rows deleted per second for each selected TE. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") FROM "Deletes" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Rows Deleted

panels.description: The average number of active transactions that are in a pending insert wait as measured by wait time associated with pending insert relative to interval window.  Pending Insert Wait is when a TE is waiting for acknowledgement from chairman that an insert will not invalidate uniqueness constraint on unique indexes. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.
panels.title: Number Inserts Pending

panels.description: The average number of active transactions that are in a pending update wait as measured by wait time associated with pending update relative to interval window.  Pending Updte Wait is when a TE is waiting for acknowledgement from chairman that an update does not conflict with other transactions. The graph is a stack graph so top line is the average sum across all selected TEs.  The hover tooltip will show the individual values.

targets.query: SELECT SUM("value") FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS value FROM "PendingUpdateWaitTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval),"host"

panels.title: Number Update Pending

list.label: Database
list.name: database
list.query: select distinct("db") from (select first(raw) from "Milliseconds" where $timeFilter GROUP BY "db")

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: select distinct("host") from (select first(raw) from "Milliseconds" where $timeFilter AND db =~ /$database$/ AND nodetype = 'Transaction' GROUP BY "host")
